dict.acceptation: 大学；（英国）学院；学会；（尤指必须交费的）中学；

sent.orig: What are you studying at college? What do you want to do after you finish college?
sent.trans: 你在大学学什么？你大学毕业以后想干什么？

sent.orig: College student party is built is college party a very main component in building.
sent.trans: 高校学生党建是高校党建中一个十分重要的组成部分。

sent.orig: The Energy Resource College an only research college between secondary colleges of Chengdu University of Technology.
sent.trans: 能源学院是成都理工大学唯一的一个研究型二级学院。

sent.orig: John Harvard was not the founder of Harvard College; and the College started in 1636.
sent.trans: 哈佛先生也不是哈佛大学的创办者；并且哈佛创办于1636年。

sent.orig: The fourth constituent college, Shaw College, was set up in 1986.
sent.trans: 第四所成员书院是逸夫书院，在一九八六年创立。
